nodes.text: There are a couple of small sarcophagi in this chamber. I guess they are a set.
It's surprisingly cold here - and sort of spooky.
Okay, this is not creepy at all - much.
You're telling me that a Minotaur robbed and killed you...
Okay, so you are telling me that a Minotaur killed you and stole your locket. You're talking about a half-man, half-bull thing with horns and muscles and really big, right?
So what is it that you want me to do?
You want me to kill a giant bull monster with my bare hands, is that it?
I've had a chat with Ferdy. He's really kind of a nice guy for a Minotaur. He says that your death was an accident. He's the one who brought you here and gave you a proper funeral...
Ooookaaay, I'll keep that in mind when next I see him.
Well, it's been interesting talking to you. Gotta go now...
Yikes. Those ghosts were creepy and sad and scary all at the same time.
I'm sorry, I just don't speak ghost.
Yikes... nice ghosts... I'll just talk to you later... Bye!
It still feels creepy and sad here.
Okay, sure, I'll try to find this two ton monster murderous Minotaur of yours and get your locket back if I ever happen to come across one, okay?
Fine... I'll just catch you both later... Have fun. Bye!
Ugh. I wouldn't want those two ghosts angry at me. They are pretty scary.
Sorry, but I'm not the dark avenger sort of person. You should totally talk to a Paladin. I'm sure one would be glad to help you...
Okay... okay. I'll do what I can for you. Just try to get some rest... No sense in haunting this place. Don't wait up for me.
Whoa, that was pretty scary. Good thing I'm not a Minotaur. Those ghosts would have sucked out my soul.
As it turns out, I already defeated the Minotaur. I just happen to have your locket right here.
I hope that they can find rest now.

nodes.message: I don't think this will ever get hit. We only invoke this script if you have the locket

nodes.text: Fine. I'll keep my eyes open for any Minotaurs I come across. Might take a while, so don't bother to wait up.
